1 <?php
2 
6 namespace Ubiquity\annotations\parser;
7 
16 class DocFormater {
17  protected $types = [ "boolean","string","int","mixed","array" ];
18  protected $replacements = [ "types" => "<span style='font-weight:bold;color: green;'>$1</span>","variables" => "<span style='font-weight:bold;color: brown;'>$1</span>" ];
19 
20  public function __construct() {
21  }
22 
23  public function getReplacement($part) {
24  return $this->replacements [$part];
25  }
26 
27  protected function getTypesRegex() {
28  $items = \array_map ( function ($item) {
29  return "(" . $item . ")";
30  }, $this->types );
31  return '^(' . \implode ( '|', $items ) . ').*?';
32  }
33 
34  protected function getVariablesRegex() {
35  return '(\$[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*)';
36  }
37 
38  protected function _replaceAll($search, $replacement, $subject) {
39  return \preg_replace ( '@' . $search . '@i', $replacement, $subject );
40  }
41 
42  public function replaceTypes($str) {
43  return $this->_replaceAll ( $this->getTypesRegex (), $this->replacements ["types"], $str );
44  }
45 
46  public function replaceVariables($str) {
47  return $this->_replaceAll ( $this->getVariablesRegex (), $this->replacements ["variables"], $str );
48  }
49 
50  public function replaceAll($str) {
51  $str = $this->replaceTypes ( $str );
52  return $this->replaceVariables ( $str );
53  }
54 }
